Text: Re Oct Teleconference DIALING INSTRUCTIONSSorry folks I should have mentioned a duration for Fridays teleconference Please allow minutes Dennis will update us if he thinks more time is required Samantha Smith wrote Gentlemen The Oct am MDT am Pacific am Central am Eastern teleconference is now confirmed Dialing Instructions Long Distance participants will dial Calgary participants will dial Pass Codes ChairMcConaghy will key Other participants will key Call or email me if Ive been unclear Thanks Samantha Smith Subject Friday Teleconference Date Wed Oct From Dennis McConaghy Organization TransCanada To I like to request your support my arranging a teleconference for Friday morning like around am mst The points I like to cover would be status of collective letter language clarification of process going forward for the collective letter who is it sent to a response to Murkowski letter how is it conveyed to the Democratic side when final canvas of each of the partners for going forward My secretary Samantha will try to put this together this afternoon unless I recieve any show stopper feedback over the afternoon samanthasmithvcf

Oct Teleconference Your Availability Cc Gentlemen Dennis McConaghy has requested another teleconference with all of you The call has been tentatively scheduled for pm Mountain Time Tuesday October pm Pacific pm Central pm Eastern If this time does not work for you we could look at moving the call to later that evening Please contact me regarding your availability Thanks Samantha Smith samanthasmithvcf
